INSERT INTO player_tb(playerId, betId, teamId, userId, position, point, vote ) VALUES(#{playerId}, #{betId}, #{teamId}, #{userId}, #{position}, #{point}, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT playerId, betId, teamId, userId, position, point, vote FROM player_tb WHERE playerId = #{playerId}
SELECT playerId, betId, teamId, userId, position, point, vote FROM player_tb WHERE teamId = #{teamId} AND betId = #{betId}
mapper.update: UPDATE player_tb set teamId = #{teamId}, position = #{position}, point = #{point}, vote = #{vote} WHERE playerId = #{playerId}
mapper.select: SELECT playerId, betId, teamId, userId, position, point, vote FROM player_tb WHERE userId = #{userId}
